sourceMeaningMnemonic: After your <radical>wedding</radical> you have a baby and it uses its <radical>mouth</radical> to <kanji>suckle</kanji> from your post-wedding boobs. Yes, babies <kanji>nurse</kanji> from breasts. Get over it, kids.
meaningInfo: You waited until your wedding to have your baby and all it seems to do with its mouth is suckle. It doesn't cry, which is nice, but it doesn't laugh or talk either.
readingMnemonic: The baby wants to <kanji>nurse</kanji> all day and the only thing you can seem to do at the same time is <reading>hoe</reading> (<ja>ほ</ja>) your garden. You hold the baby to your breast with one arm and hoe little rows with the other. It's actually a great workout and a nice way to spend time!
readingInfo: This hoe has really helped you get through nursing. You think you'll keep this up even after your baby is weened! Hoeing the garden is your new favorite hobby!
